english.segment1: Men will try to rule the world You made. But we know power is Yours alone to give and take. A day will come when every knee will bow. And every tongue confess that You are Lord. Both now and forever
english.segment2: Day after day our God is reigning. He's never shaken, my hope is in the Lord. Time after time our God is faithful. Trustworthy Savior, my hope is in the Lord
english.segment3: The fear of man and what they plan will fade. But we know You alone are God of every day. Like the flowers, man will rise and fall. But You are everlasting, never ending God eternal
